name: Camelia
storyline: Camelia is a robot – only a few weeks old, actually, built and programmed by a lonely, enigmatic man. She is the first of her kind – and comes with a slew of flaws. Wildly curious, she knows nothing about her surroundings, and cannot recognize emotions. It has now been tasked to her by Father to learn about the nearby forest, and experience and recognise feelings and emotions. In the end, her true goal is to find happiness. Real, true happiness, for which she travels deep into the forest to find. Her happiness, however, may be right under her nose.
summary:
Camelia is an adventure story-telling game. There are no game overs, and only one ending. It's nothing but a story.

Camelia comments on many things in her house - make sure you explore it thoroughly and often. Please take the time to learn about the world with her - and make sure you stay after the credits, or you won’t be able to learn what gives her happiness.
